sqlMap.select:
SELECT BEHALF_ORDER_ID ,MER_ORDER_ID ,MER_ORDER_TIME ,BUS_MER_ID ,STATUS ,CREATE_TIME ,FINISH_TIME ,TOTAL_NUMBER ,SUCCESS_MUMBER ,FAIL_NUMBER ,AMOUNT ,TRANS_AMOUNT ,BACK_URL ,ORDER_ID ,MER_NAME ,SUB_MER_ID FROM V2_BANK_BEHALF_ORDER WHERE 1=1 AND V2_BANK_BEHALF_ORDER.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(BEHALF_ORDER_ID) =#behalf_order_id#
(MER_ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_ORDER_TIME) Like '%'||(#mer_order_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BUS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#bus_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TOTAL_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#total_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUCCESS_MUMBER) Like '%'||(#success_mumber:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FAIL_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#fail_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AMOUNT) Like '%'||(#amount:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_AMOUNT) Like '%'||(#trans_amount:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BACK_URL) Like '%'||(#back_url:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM V2_BANK_BEHALF_ORDER WHERE 1=1 AND V2_BANK_BEHALF_ORDER.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(BEHALF_ORDER_ID) =#behalf_order_id#
(MER_ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_ORDER_TIME) Like '%'||(#mer_order_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BUS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#bus_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TOTAL_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#total_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUCCESS_MUMBER) Like '%'||(#success_mumber:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FAIL_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#fail_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AMOUNT) Like '%'||(#amount:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_AMOUNT) Like '%'||(#trans_amount:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BACK_URL) Like '%'||(#back_url:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
